title: Pupil: Inspired By a True Story
description:
What do you do when the attraction is wrong, but too strong to deny?
Adam Clark isn’t exactly living the dream, but he’s doing what he loves: freelancing as a pinup photographer. When he’s offered the chance to fulfill another dream—teaching photography at a small liberal arts college—the opportunity and the chance for steady income are too good to miss.The only catch is keeping his head above water in a student body that’s 90% female. And stunning theater major Carrie Desmond isn’t about to let him drown, not when she’s there to save him.Carrie and Adam fight their intense attraction for one another for as long as they can, but when a jealous rival uncovers their secret, their carefully hidden affair may come to light in a very, very public way.*BONUS BOOK*: Relatively Torn: A Manhattan Heir Romance, a full-length novel from Zoey Long, is included at the end of this book, completely FREE!
author: Zoey Long
